languages.text: Простор Коронус узнал имя наследни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры фон Валанциус. Отныне любые действия против е{mf|го|е} собственности будут рассматриваться как покушение на священные привилегии Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Простор Коронус узнал имя наследни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры фон Валанциус. Отныне любые действия против е{mf|го|е} собственности будут рассматриваться не как присвоение ничейной собственности, а как покушение на священные привелегии Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Простор Коронус узнал имя наследни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры фон Валанциус. Отныне любые действия против е{mf|го|е} собственности будут рассматриваться как покушение на священные привилегии Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 整个科罗努斯扩区都听说了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯继承人的名字。从今以后，任何针对{mf|他|她}的财产的不轨之举，都将被视为对行商浪人神圣特权的威胁。
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 整个科罗努斯扩区都听说了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯继承人的名字。从今以后，任何针对{mf|他|她}的财产的不轨之举，都将被视为对行商浪人神圣特权的威胁。

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスはシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者の名前を知った。今後、{mf|彼|彼女}の所有物に対するあらゆる行為は、自由開拓者の神聖な特権に対する脅威とみなされる。
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスはシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者の名前を知った。今後、{mf|彼|彼女}の所有物に対するあらゆる行為は、自由開拓者の神聖な特権に対する脅威とみなされる。

languages.text: La Extensión de Koronus ya conoce el nombre de{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de Theodora von Valancius. A partir de ahora, cualquier acto contra sus posesiones se considerará una amenaza a los privilegios sagrados de los Comerciantes Independientes.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión de Koronus ya conoce el nombre de{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de Theodora von Valancius. A partir de ahora, cualquier acto contra sus posesiones se considerará una amenaza a los privilegios sagrados de los Comerciantes Independientes.

languages.text: Die Koronus-Ausdehnung hat den Namen {mf|des Erben|der Erbin} von Theodora von Valancius erfahren. Fortan wird jeder Angriff auf {mf|seine|ihre} Besitzungen als Bedrohung für die geheiligten Privilegien {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} betrachtet.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Die Koronus-Ausdehnung hat den Namen {mf|des Erben|der Erbin} von Theodora von Valancius erfahren. Fortan wird jeder Angriff auf {mf|seine|ihre} Besitzungen als Bedrohung für die geheiligten Privilegien {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} betrachtet.

languages.text: Les Étendues de Koronus ont appris le nom de l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora von Valancius. Par conséquent, tout atteinte à ses possessions sera considérée comme une menace envers les privilèges sacrés d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Les Étendues de Koronus ont appris le nom de l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora von Valancius. Par conséquent, tout atteinte à ses possessions sera considérée comme une menace envers les privilèges sacrés d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği, Theodora von Valancius'un vârisinin adını öğrendi. Bundan böyle himayesindeki mülklerine düzenlenecek herhangi bir saldırı, Hür Tacir'in kutsal imtiyazlarına yönelik bir tehdit olarak değerlendirilecek.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse has learned the name of Theodora von Valancius's heir. Henceforth, any acts against {mf|his|her} possessions will be considered a threat to the sacred privileges of a Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Koronus Enginliği, Theodora von Valancius'un vârisinin adını öğrendi. Dolayısıyla himayesindeki varlıklara düzenlenecek herhangi bir saldırı, Hür Tacir'in kutsal imtiyazlarına yönelik bir tehdit olarak değerlendirilecek.
